text: The Himalayan goral (Naemorhedus goral), also known as the gray goral, is a member of the Caprinae subfamily. It is a small, rough-haired, cylindrical- horned ruminant native to the Himalayas. In the past, it was also known as Urotragus goral. Category:Caprids Category:Mammals of Asia
title: Himalayan goral
